fileScanResults.purpose: Generate tag links for models in a CRM system.
fileScanResults.reasoning: The method tags_for_index is vulnerable to XSS due to unsafe query interpolation in link_to_function.

region.snippet:
def tags_for_index(model)
    model.tags.inject("".html_safe) do |out, tag|
      query = controller.send(:current_query) || ""
      hashtag = "##{tag}"
      if query.empty?
        query = hashtag
      elsif !query.include?(hashtag)
        query += " #{hashtag}"
      end
